name: ext_R5_DeviceAssociation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DeviceAssociation for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceAssociation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceAssociation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: A record of association or dissociation of a device with a patient
element.definition: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.
